actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, in order to remove an inequity from the laws concerning medical care for dependents of members of the uniformed services.

summary.text: Provides that when a member of the uniformed services dies while he is on active duty for a period of more than thirty days, his dependents who are receiving benefits for a moderate or severe mental handicap or a serious physical handicap shall continue to be eligible for such benefits until they pass their twenty-first birthday. (Amends 10 USC 1079(g))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, in order to remove an inequity from the laws concerning medical care for dependents of members of the uniformed services.
